description: This table contains procedure level information for external procedures.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient estimate record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CONTEXT_LINE
columns.description: Contains a pointer to the external context line which can be referenced via the table PR_EST_EXTERNAL_CXT.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: Procedure code used to represent the service for which this estimate was made.

columns.name: MODIFIERS
columns.description: Procedure modifiers associated with the service for which the estimate was made.

columns.name: QUANTITY
columns.description: The procedure quantity associated with the estimated service.

columns.name: CHARGE_AMOUNT
columns.description: The charge amount associated with the estimated service.

columns.name: ALLOWED_AMOUNT
columns.description: The allowed amount associated with the estimated service.

columns.name: SELF_PAY_AMOUNT
columns.description: The self-pay amount for the estimated service.
